title: Secrets of interpretation of seeing a dream about selling in a dream and its meaning for good and evil

preview.html: Many are looking around. Interpretation of seeing a dream about selling in a dream. According to all the situations that can be seen in the dream, the dreamer can see the sale of the house, as he can see the sale of the land, or the workplace, and the house’s clothes, goods, and furniture. Sometimes the vision is in a dream of selling things in the neighborhood. , where the sleeper sees that he sold something to someone he knows who is dead, which makes him curious to understand and interpret the vision that he had in his dream, whether it indicates good or bad. Interpretation of selling in a dream This is what we will show you in this article from the Encyclopedia We often see in The world of dreams has many visions whose repercussions we do not understand in reality and we do not know the reason for seeing them in a dream, so the dreamer begins to ask many questions about this dream, especially if this portends good or portends something bad, and is the vision basically true or is it self-talk that is not conveyed? A specific interpretation, and the dreamer’s curiosity to learn about the dream symbols increases by searching the Internet. What did the dream interpreters say about the sale symbol in the dream? This you can see in the following lines.Interpretation of seeing a dream of selling in a dreamBelow are presented the interpretations proposed by dream interpretation scholars for seeing selling in a dream:The dreamer’s vision that he is offered for sale in the dream, called by sellers, indicates that he will be honored and will obtain a prestigious position from which he will earn money. . It shows what will happen to him and when he sees it. Its price is high and high, and the buyers are many, so this indicates greater benefit for him and his future, and God knows best. Seeing selling captives or slaves in the market, even if it appears outwardly to harm the dreamer, but in reality it is a good vision that symbolizes changing his situation to good and consolation. He pays his debt by God’s command. Sometimes, selling in a dream indicates that the dreamer no longer has a desire or passion for the thing he is selling, and also in the case of buying, it symbolizes the departure of the dreamer’s desire to possess what he bought and desires it so badly. The meaning of the sale symbol in Ibn Sirin’s dream, interpreted Ibn Sirin sees selling in a dream as a sign of financial loss or loss of the job that the dreamer holds, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees that he is selling real estate that he does not like in reality, this is a sign of problems in reality. If the dreamer dreams that he is selling real estate that is of great importance For him, this is considered a distasteful dream that expresses a crisis in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing selling in a dream by Al-Nabulsi The dream interpreter Al-Nabulsi showed that selling in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s asceticism towards something in reality and his desire not to become attached to it. If the dreamer sees himself being sold in the slave market in Dreaming, the meaning of this dream lies in the arrival of comfort and the removal of worry and sadness from the dreamer, as the dream indicates the patient’s recovery and release. Prisoner. If the dreamer dreams that he is selling a cheap drug, then this is considered a good dream that expresses kindness and living. If the dreamer sees that he is selling a Qur’an, a rosary, or a grave, this indicates how busy the dreamer is with worldly matters out of obedience to God. When the dreamer sees that he is selling something of Value for something cheap, f

title: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream and a black snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man. If I see a black snake chasing me, chasing me, and killing the black snake in the house, the room, Ibn Sirin’s bed, and others. The black snake in a dream is one of the very frightening and terrifying dreams that we see in our dreams, but it is not In a continuous way, it afflicts the dreamer with a lot of fear and terror when he sees the black snake inside. A dream that we see in a dream in many different ways, such as a black snake attacking us in a dream or having a snake in the house or seeing it walking on the ground in some way in a dream which causes us fear. A black snake in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, explained to us that seeing a snake in a dream has many important meanings and signals that come to the dreamer and that a person must know to get the correct interpretation of the dream. Interpretation of a black snake in a dream. A black snake in a dream is evidence of the need to be careful in dealing with it. Any person, especially an emotional one in life. A black snake in a dream is evidence of strife, great enmity, and hatred. Seeing a black snake in a person’s dream is evidence of the hostility of one of his relatives. A black snake in a dream is evidence of disputes and enmity that will happen to a person and between a person who holds a grudge against him. If Seeing black snakes in a dream in abundance is evidence of treachery and deception that comes to them on a large scale. Seeing black snakes in a dream repeatedly is evidence of exposure to a great deal of hatred. A black snake in a dream is evidence of trade and the need to prevent the dreamer from coming dangers. Seeing a black snake In bed in a dream is evidence of worries and misfortunes that befall the dreamer. A man seeing a black snake in a dream at the door of the house is evidence of the envy of the coming person. Seeing a black snake inside the house is evidence of gossip. Seeing a black snake in a dream in the kitchen is evidence of lack of food and livelihood in... Home. A black snake in a dream is evidence of imminent evil for the dreamer. Seeing someone with a snake in a dream is evidence that he will gain great kingship and power. The snake is one of the worst enemies of a person in life. The snake mostly means life, that is, a new life written for you, but the color of the snake In a dream, it has an impact on interpretation, so each color has an interpretation. If you dream that there is a snake that swallows you, this means that you will become in a position of power or prestige, and there are those who dream that they eat cooked snake meat, and this means that you will get money from it. Your enemy: If you dream that you are walking in a place full of snakes, but no snake bites you, this means that you will be released from prison if you are imprisoned or that you are safe from enemies. If you dream that your orchard or farm is full of snakes, this indicates the maturity and growth of trees and fruits. Interpretation of a black snake in A dream: The black color of snakes is often an enemy of people. If you dream of killing a snake in a dream in bed, this means that your wife will die, because the snake in a dream has many forms that

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of dreams about a kiss on the mouth of a lover

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss from a lover’s mouth: One of the visions that ignite passion in a person is seeing hugs or kisses, especially if they are from someone who loves the mouth, cheek, or neck. It could be from a lover or a stranger. In this article, we will list all the details of this vision, especially seeing a kiss on the mouth. Beloved. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss from the mouth of a lover. Seeing a kiss in general expresses the urgent need for love, the constant search for sources of satisfaction of inner desires, and the search for safety and shelter in the world. Seeing a kiss on the mouth shows a person who is full of love and completely controlled by emotion, who does not make a decision or take a step. Without it, because of the voice of his heart, and this can cause him to miss a lot of things due to the imbalance between the voice of logic and the appeal of emotion. Al-Nabulsi states in his interpretation of the dream of kissing on the mouth that this vision symbolizes profit and participation in many projects from which a person earns a lot of money and the inclination with every thought toward... The practical side, converting what is broken and what is. Defective in something that one can benefit from. If a girl sees that her lover is kissing her on the mouth, this indicates her intense desire for him and her great love for having him by her side and an attempt to strengthen the bond that connects her with him and the presence of many changes. Which the girl will witness in the near future and the positivity or negativity of these changes depends on her actions. Seeing her kissing her lover on the mouth is undesirable if it happens in a dark place, this indicates great sin, lack of transparency, and a tendency to satisfy desires in any way. And if she sees herself kissing Her lover is on her mouth, and there is someone watching her or looking at her, this indicates the presence of someone close to her who envies her and is trying to spoil her relationship with her partner. In every possible way. A kiss on the mouth expresses a sensitive personality, which is very loving and trusts others a lot. This personality tends to exchange good feelings with all people, as he has a high sense of humor, and this feeling causes him a lot of harm, especially when he is exposed to frustration. This vision It is also a sign of permanent renewal, loss of despair, and a sense of vitality, activity, and freedom from all the reasons that would cause the viewer to lose his enthusiasm and passion, and the ability to break records if there is the will to do so. Whoever sees that the lover kisses him, this is evidence that the emotional relationship has reached its peak. , and that the emotional state has developed for the better, and the many problems that the two parties faced at the beginning of their acquaintance. And the solutions of other crises that are likely to occur in the future have ended. If the dreamer feels comfortable while kissing on the mouth, this means that he hears praise and words that please the soul and heart, feels psychological comfort and satisfaction, forgets all complicated matters and thinks only about the future of the relationship. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss In the mouth of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin differentiates in his interpretation of the kiss, whether it is from the mouth, cheek, or neck, between lust or less than lust. This vision, in this sense, expresses marriage or intercourse and achieving stability after a period of fluctuations.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tiger in detail. The cheetah is a type of wild cat. The cheetah has a characteristic that distinguishes it from other animals, and one of its characteristics is extreme speed. It is one of the fastest animals on the face of the earth, as its speed exceeds a car traveling at two hundred and sixty kilometers per hour. It is a fierce fighter, and the cheetah is the last fixed claw of animals, due to its disappearance after a long time. Due to natural factors, the tiger's nature tends toward isolation. It sleeps for hours on rocky surfaces and above. Treetop Cheetahs live in many places around the world, and jaguars are found largely in tropical rainforests and savannahs, South Africa, Pakistan and Iran. Namibia is called the land of cheetahs because of their abundance. When a female reaches her third birthday, the gestation period of a female cheetah ranges from ninety to one hundred days. Of the types of cheetah, black panther, cheetah, Asian cheetah, Indian cheetah, Korean cheetah, Korean cheetah, snow leopard, many of us employ our thoughts with a dream for anyone A predatory animal and we are interested in its interpretation. Dream interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream has repercussions and meanings. We will learn about its interpretation in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a tiger in a dream as a sign of separation between friends, family, or loved ones. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tiger trapped in a dream, whether in the garden or in a cage, is an unfortunate vision, because It indicates an inability to bear responsibility, bad thinking, and action. A tiger attacking a person dreaming in a dream indicates the failure of the dreamer and many fears that the dreamer is already facing. Escaping from a tiger and getting rid of it in a dream is evidence of getting rid of crises and problems, alleviating pain, getting rid of stress, and overcoming stress. Problems and the ability to defeat enemies. A tiger bite for someone dreaming in a dream is evidence of hostility, rivalry, deceit, and conspiracy on the part of the dreamer’s enemies. Eating tiger meat in a dream is a sign of victory over enemies and taking away their wealth and money. Seeing a tiger sharing its food in a dream is a sign of security and peace. Which the dreamer will experience in life. Seeing the skin or hair of a leopard in a dream indicates many fears and problems in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a leopard for a single woman: Seeing a leopard in a single girl’s dream is evidence of engagement and marriage in the coming days with a good and pious person that you can She lives a happy life with him. The skin of a tiger in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the dowry that her fiancé will give her. A tiger’s attack on a girl in a dream is testimony to admirers and lovers who are actually chasing her. Interpretation of a dream about a leopard for a married woman: Seeing a tiger in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness. And living. Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a tiger in a married woman’s dream is evidence of happiness with her husband, security, stability, happiness, and tranquility. The presence of a tiger in a married woman’s house in a dream indicates happiness and stability with her husband. Hugging a tiger in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant.

title: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Seeing a mouse in a dream, the mouse is a type of rodent that has many species, most of which live in the human environment, and seeing it in a dream will surprise many people and make them wonder about the meanings and implications associated with this dream. Seeing a mouse in a dream There are many interpretations that jurists have explained in the dream of a mouse, the most important of which can be explained through the following: Whoever sees a mouse in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of a deceitful person in his life who seeks to harm or exploit him, so he should stay away from him as much as possible. If a girl dreams of a mouse, this is a sign that she is surrounded by a malicious friend who shows her love and harbors hatred, envy and hatred, and she must be removed from her life so that she is not harmed. And if you work in trade and see a mouse while sleeping, this warns that you will be exposed to theft or financial loss in the coming period, so there is no need to be careful. When a person sees a mouse in a dream in the dark, it leads to his illness soon and attention must be paid to the type of food he eats. Seeing a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin We have reviewed the indications mentioned by the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin, may God have mercy on him, seeing a mouse in a dream: Seeing A mouse in a dream symbolizes the presence of a spiteful and inappropriate woman in the dreamer's life who seeks to harm him, and he must stay away from her immediately. If you dream of a lot of mice, this is a sign of relief from anxiety and earning a lot of money that will improve your living conditions and social status. If you see a mouse circling around the house, this is a sign that God - Glory be to Him - will allow you to pay off all the debts that have accumulated on you in a short period of time and the tension and fear you are experiencing will reach you. The end and feel safe and comfortable. If we see the mouse leaving the house while sleeping, this indicates a lack of blessing and unfortunate luck that will accompany the dreamer for a period of his life, whether personally or professionally. If you harm the mouse in a dream, this proves that you have offended a woman in reality, as well as in the event of killing it. Seeing a mouse in a dream for a single woman If a girl sees a mouse while sleeping, this is a sign that there is a person in her life who is trying to tarnish her reputation in front of people and she must remove it from her life immediately. If a single woman dreams of a black mouse, this is a sign that she will face many bad events that will disturb her life in the near future, so she must be patient until these days finally end. Seeing a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman also symbolizes receiving bad news about one of her family members in the coming days. Seeing a mouse in a dream warns the girl against excessive trust in one of her friends, because he repeats it and does not wish her well. If a virgin is going through a crisis in her life and dreams of a white mouse, this proves her ability to find a solution to the problem she is going through. What is the interpretation of a mouse in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman dreams With a mouse, this indicates that she has a competitor or an enemy who is planning against her and wants to harm her, so she should be careful. If the married woman is a worker and sees a mouse in her sleep, then this indicates that

If a married woman dreams of a mouse, this It indicates that she has a competitor or an enemy who is planning for her and wants to harm her, so she should be careful. If a married woman is a worker and sees a mouse during her sleep, then she will be humiliated.

title: The meaning of a dream about a well according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a well in a dream indicates the presence of money for the dreamer or useful knowledge, or it may indicate marriage, and the water of the well in a dream for a man is a beautiful woman, while for a woman it is a male character, and the following is the meaning of a dream about a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. The meaning of a dream about a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin Sirin The meaning of a dream about a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin The presence of wells and water since the existence of man indicates life, as man built villages and cities next to it to meet his needs, and for adults there are symbolic meanings, and the well shows fear of its depth and darkness and it can also be a symbol of goodness due to the presence of water in it. It may A well in a dream indicates distress after comfort, according to the story of our master Joseph, peace be upon him, when his brothers threw him and a group took him with them to Egypt and he became in love with Egypt. Seeing a well can also indicate the owner of the house, his money, and their livelihood. It can indicate the wife because she is feminine. It can also indicate the owner of the house, his money, and their livelihood. Interpretation of the well as injustice or relief after oppression, conspiracy, and relief after machinations. Interpretation of the vision of falling into a well: If he sees that he has fallen into the well, and if his money is pure, then the dreamer’s work will be for a righteous man who reaps his livelihood from it. But if he sees that the well contains dirty water, then it is theft. And injustice. As for seeing himself sitting in a well without falling into it, this indicates that the fortuneteller is dealing with an evil man and will save him from his evil. But if he sees himself falling into a dry well, this indicates a plot or betrayal he is exposed to on the part of a friend. Seeing drowning in a well shows greed. The fortune teller. If he sees himself pushing others into the well, this indicates that he is deceiving a brother or friend. Seeing water from a well in a dream. If he sees that he is drinking from the well’s water, this indicates money from deception. And if he sees that the well contains water to the end, There is no objection to it, but if he sees that water is overflowing from it, then this indicates worry, sadness, and crying, and may indicate misfortunes resulting from money. If he sees that the well in a dream is unknown and has fresh water, then this indicates the long life of the pioneer. If he sees the well without Water, this indicates loss. As for the dream of drinking water from a well, if it is fresh, this indicates the expansion of the world for the poor and the marriage of unmarried people. As for a pregnant woman’s dream of drinking water from a well, if it is fresh, this indicates the presence of a child in her stomach. Interpretation Seeing luxury dug in a dream: Dreaming about digging a well means marrying a wealthy woman if there is water in the well. And if he sees that he is digging a well without water, this indicates marrying a woman who has no money. So whoever sees that the well is in his house, this will benefit him. Digging a well in The dream indicates interest. Interpretation of the vision by looking into the well shows that the dreamer is thinking about a woman and wants to marry her. Seeing a man looking into a well indicates his anxiety, and if a woman also looks at a well, then this is her concern for the purity of the water. Seeing a well in a dream for a womanIf a woman sees A well overflowing with water, this means that she will have more than one child. And if she sees that she is watering the orchards from the well, this indicates that she will return to her children or take care of them. Seeing a woman falling into the well

title: Interpretation of seeing the Sacred Mosque in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of seeing the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream. It is one of the beautiful visions that carries the best, most beautiful and beautiful signs, and its interpretation varies according to the social status of the dreamer. Because the Kaaba is the House of God and the most beautiful House of God, it has a special sanctity in the souls of all Muslims. Who among us does not dream of visiting the Sacred House of God instead of a thousand times, for it is the land of the House of God and the mosque of His Noble Messenger, the land of fulfilling wishes and miracles and answering them. Supplications, seeing the Sacred Mosque in a dream with more joyful visions, but people ask about their interpretation, so in our article today we will discuss the interpretation of seeing the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in detail, according to what scholars such as Ibn Sirin say. See Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi, and the meaning of the dream and its meaning for married, pregnant and single women through the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the Sacred Mosque in a dream. Seeing the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in his dream, then the person will have the satisfaction of his long-held desires. Waiting for it, because the land of the Holy Mosque in Mecca is the land of satisfying desires, and God is supreme and supreme. He knows better. As for whoever sees himself in a dream wandering around the Sacred House of God, this is a sign of a job opportunity in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia on his way there by God’s command. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is entering the Kaaba itself, this indicates the death of the dreamer if he is sick, And God is Most High and knows the purpose. As for whoever thought that he entered the Mosque of Mecca while he was single, Al-Bisri was close to marrying a good girl and enjoying happiness and success with her. As for whoever saw himself inside the Mosque of Mecca standing in front of the Kaaba crying, it was a sign of relief and the end of worries and sorrows, and there is goodness. And peace and harmony between them. As for whoever sees in his dream a person who has left our world, but is standing in front of the Sacred House of God (the Kaaba) inside the Mosque of Mecca, and he is crying loudly, then this is evidence of goodness. From the state of the dead and without good, with God’s forgiveness for him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi sees that whoever sees the Grand Mosque in Mecca in his dream, but he is inside his house and the Kaaba is visible, this is an indication that the dreamer is one of the favorite figures with a good reputation among the people and that Everyone around them loves him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the pilgrims and those who circle around the House of God are many in the dreamer’s vision and they are all inside his house, then this is good news for him of a great promotion and a position of power and status on the path of the dreamer and pioneer. God is Most High and Most Knowing. If someone dreams that he enters the Kaaba in the Holy Mosque in Mecca, this is a sign of his recovery from illnesses and pains if he is sick, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the person is single, this means that he will marry one of the girls with a good reputation and high morals, and enjoy love, happiness, and success. Whoever sees in her dream the Sacred Mosque in Mecca and is not married, this is evidence that God answered her prayers and that many of the dreams and aspirations that she wanted from God for a period of time will be fulfilled by God’s command and His grace. As for seeing collapses and falling stones inside

title: The 11 most famous interpretations of seeing Abraham in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the name of our Master Abraham in a dream? A sign of the great goodness that prevails in the dreamer. The meaning of seeing Abraham? It means visiting the Holy House of God. What is the interpretation of seeing the name of our Master Abraham and finding water in your dream? Evidence of a cure for an illness. The interpretation of seeing the name Abraham in a single woman’s dream? This means What is the interpretation of seeing Abraham for a pregnant woman? This means that her child is born. Seeing Abraham in a dream. If one is thinking about performing Hajj and is unable to do so, then seeing Abraham means visiting the Holy House of God. It announces marriage to a girl or a man who has not yet married. After that, if she looks To the Father of the Prophets as the victory of Almighty God over enmity. You may be troubled at first, but in the end you will be victorious. It refers to the son of bad morals and disobedience. If you see our master Abraham and find water in your dream, then this is a cure for an illness or you have to fulfill it. Then if you see A ram or a sacrifice in your dream, this means that a wish has been delayed, and the time has come to fulfill it. Interpretation of the vision of our master Abraham, as you are tending sheep, means that you will be a preacher to good people who imitate you. Dream of the name of our master Abraham. The name of our master Abraham in a dream is evidence of the great goodness that prevails in the dreamer, He accompanies a number of righteous people who do good deeds. This person is positive and does not remain silent about evil and calls on people to follow the correct behavior. If this person is single or married and has not yet given birth, then this vision means providing righteous offspring. Interpretation of Abraham’s dream about unmarried women. Seeing the name of our master Abraham means marriage Who is this girl? The interpretation of the vision of our Master Abraham indicates marriage to a good and generous man. Perhaps it indicates a visit to the Kaaba and Hajj. The interpretation of the name Abraham in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will fall into distress, but she will be released in a short time. Interpretation of Abraham’s dream about a pregnant womanIf you In distress, seeing the name of our master Abraham means immediate relief. The interpretation of seeing Abraham for a pregnant woman means that her newborn is a male and that he will enjoy high qualities among his peers in the future. It means easy birth without fatigue and hardship. Sustenance for abundant money and removing anxiety and distress after birth. Seeing the Maqam of Abraham in a dream: Whoever dreams of the House of the Father of the Prophets in a dream, means that he is a righteous man, especially the one who sees that he is praying in this holy place, and fears the conspiracies and machinations of men. And he dreamed that he entered the altar of our Master Abraham, perhaps he would be safe from his people, and their treachery would not harm him. Whoever works and works hard and tries to get a place or a position, or a candidate for a specific job, then entering the position means victory and promotion at work, which is the inheritance he gets from the father or perhaps the mother, and the interpretation of the place is better for the dreamer in all cases.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing treasure in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about treasure in a dream in detail. Treasure is one of the things that appears in the dreams of many people. In reality, they are happy when they discover and find treasure, but what are the signs that they see? Treasure appears in a dream. Certainly, it has many meanings that we will explain with the great Arab interpreters and scholars in interpreting seeing treasure in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about treasure according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi explained that he found the treasure but there was only a little money. This indicates that he faced small crises in his life. As for the dreamer’s dream of a treasure containing a lot of money, it is evidence of the coming of worries and sorrows. Seeing a treasure indicates It contains a lot of money and also leads to the death of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about treasure by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation books seeing treasure in a dream because it indicates a woman’s pregnancy. Gold in a dream also indicates boys. Silver in a dream shows slaves. Seeing treasure in a dream For a merchant, it is abundant profit and goodness. Like seeing treasure in a dream for success and victory. Interpretation of a dream about treasure for a married woman: Seeing a married woman whose husband took treasure in a dream indicates many problems in reality between them. As for the married woman’s opinion that her husband took a lot of money, she will get On testimony. Seeing buried treasure in a dream for a married woman is a sign of imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about buried treasure: Seeing buried treasure containing precious jewels is a glimpse of money and survival. As for seeing buried treasure in a dream, but it contains cheap things, This is evidence that he is trying to achieve a certain thing, but he cannot. As for the dream of hiding treasure from people in a dream, this indicates how ready the dreamer is in reality to hide his secrets. Interpretation of the dream of treasure in the captain’s dream: Seeing the ruler as if he found a great treasure in the dream means That he will lose the rule. Seeing the ruler found a treasure and not seeing its contents means that he will get a lot of money. Seeing an inaccessible treasure in a dream is a sign of unhappiness in reality.
